00057 //Types and defaults______________________________________________________________________
00059 typedef volatile struct {
00060     volatile u08 size;  
00061     volatile u08 ctr;   
00062     u08* pIn;           
00063     u08* pOut;          
00064     u08 *data;          
00065 }ZO_BUFFER;
00066 
00068 #define ZO_BUFFER_DEFAULTS {0,0,0,0,0}
